The “problem” of Control: cage its body.

Two Priesthoods. One faith. One telos. 
CYBORG THEOCRACY.

fullText:
Google Trends中的地区搜索兴趣度≠搜索量

如果查看Google Trends中Claude、Grok等相关的搜索词趋势，会发现中国几乎都是定格的100最高分。

这是因为地区的兴趣度是按照该搜索词占所有搜索词的比例，并以最高的为100进行归一化。

fullText:
Tried a few of those vibe coded "built in a weekend" signature platforms. 

No cert chains. No tamper-proofing. No audit logs.
Just a UI and a dream.

Had a full Keyser Söze moment.

The cup drops. The truth hits. Silence.

Be skeptical — especially when it’s “done in a weekend” https://t.co/agkpbXpvpg
